message: I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more!
I believe a fair split would be 400,000 for me and 600,000 for you. Let's work together to avoid inflation issues.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share. Don't expect it to get any better!
Considering the inflation, I propose a split of 350,000 for me and 650,000 for you. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money.
